definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: What is more, it can be used to joint the alloy copper and alloy tools.
sentences.chinese: 還可適用於合金銅及合金工量具的對接。

sentences.english: Now I already had a special measuring instrument, it is not only the amount of the amount of harvest process.
sentences.chinese: 現在我已有了一種特別的量具，它不量收穫只量過程。

sentences.english: Use of precision measuring tools, such as micrometers, calipers, etc.
sentences.chinese: 會使用量具，例如螺旋測微器，卡尺等。

sentences.english: Good knowledge on measure tool and Office software.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉量具和辦公軟件的使用。

sentences.english: Have all gages been dimensionally certified?
sentences.chinese: 所有量具是否都有校驗？

sentences.english: In 1969, the following enterprise by Beijing gage start light quenching.
sentences.chinese: 1969年，北京量具刃具廠開始採用光亮淬火。

sentences.english: Mistake proofing, automated controls, set up instructions, gauges.
sentences.chinese: 防錯，自動化控制，機器設定指導書，量具。

sentences.english: Operation of general testers and measurement.
sentences.chinese: 一般量具和測試設備的操作。

sentences.english: The men who make the parts of an airplane must use strict measurements.
sentences.chinese: 製造飛機零件的工人必須使用精確的量具。

sentences.english: And always use the cup that comes with the product, a measuring spoon, or some other precise measuring device.
sentences.chinese: 始終使用產品附帶的量杯，量匙或其它精確量具。
安一量具，高品質的象徵。

sentences.english: Are checking fixtures and gages properly and periodically calibrated ?
sentences.chinese: 檢具和量具是否正確使用並定期校準？

definition: a gauge block (block for accurate measurement)

gauge that is held against an object to judge thickness, diameter etc, such as a feeler gauge, calipers etc/(abbr. for 評價量規|评价量规[ping2 jia4 liang2 gui1]) rubric (i.e. a guide listing specific criteria for grading)
level (device to determine horizontal)/spirit level/surveyor's level
